General.Name: High-Tek Harness Enterprise Co Ltd
General.Description: High-Tek Harness Enterprise Co., Ltd. engages in the electronic device manufacturing, energy engineering, urban planning, and medical and fintech technology businesses in China. It operates through Electronics Department and Engineering and Trading Division segments. The company offers computer, card, medical, and coaxial cables, as well as digital credit card and electronic payment services. In addition, it also provides international biomed travel, regenerative medicine center, and animal health management services, as well as aesthetic medicine and anti-aging treatment services, and home biotech products; engages in the wind turbine manufacturing; and offers renewable or energy funds. Further, the company engages in holding and trading activities; international trade; information software services; telecommunication equipment wholesale; animal pharmaceuticals and biotechnology; medical device and consulting services; fund business; and research and development activities, as well as undertakes development projects in urban areas. High-Tek Harness Enterprise Co., Ltd. was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.
